column1: The Purple Pig////I love the fun items on their menu; I ordered the duck prosciutto
column3: and burrata cannoli. My favorite was the duck prosciutto - sliced incredibly thinly and truly melted in my mouth! The bone marrow was also stellar
column4: so much umami! The burrata cannoli
column6: was my least favorite of the three. Most of its pricetag is probably the osetra caviar
column7: otherwise it was small for the price and I actually prefer the texture of fresh burrata over the whipped burrata in the dish.
